on reading compounds: 廓【クルワ】district, quarter, enclosure, area enclosed by earthwork, red-light district, wide and empty
廓清【カクセイ】purification, cleaning up, purging
外郭【ガイカク】outer wall (e.g. castle), outer block (enclosure), outline, contour
遊郭【ユウカク】(licensed) red light district
kun reading compounds: 廓【くるわ】district, quarter, enclosure, area enclosed by earthwork, red-light district, wide and empty
郭言葉【くるわことば】sociolect or secret language used by prostitutes in red-light districts (Edo period), vulgar words used by prostitutes (Edo period)
